commitResults.messageTitle: Level 0: rename Duke to SonOfAnton and add greet/exit
commitResults.messageBody:
* The Duke class has been renamed to SonOfAnton to personalize the ChatBot.
* Minimal Skeleton has been implemented to print a greet and exit message.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 1: Echo user input until 'bye'
commitResults.messageBody:
* Introduce an Echo class and integrate it into SonOfAnton
* The bot echoes each line and exits when the user enters 'bye'

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 2: enhance Echo program with list command and OOP structure * Extend Echo beyond simple repeat to support 'list' command for showing stored inputs * Introduce EchoSession for command/state handling * Add IO interface and ScannerIO for pluggable input/output * Place each class in its own file for better organization
Level 3: add Task model; implement mark/unmark
commitResults.messageBody:
* Introduce Task with description + isDone and [X]/[ ] rendering
* Switch EchoSession to List<Task> (replace parallel lists)
* Implement commands: mark, unmark
* Extract per-command helper methods for clarity and extensibility

commitResults.messageTitle: A-TextUiTesting: add text-UI test and expected outputs
commitResults.messageBody:
* runtest.sh — compiles, runs, and diffs program output
* input.txt — scripted user inputs
* EXPECTED.TXT — canonical expected output

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-4: ToDo, Deadline, Event
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add Task subclasses: ToDo, Deadline, Event with [T]/[D]/[E] rendering
* Extend EchoSession to handle todo <desc>, deadline <desc> /by <when>, event <desc> /from <start> /to <end>
* Keep date/time values as plain strings (no parsing)

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-5: handle invalid inputs with custom exceptions
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add exception hierarchy: SonOfAntonException, UnknownCommandException, EmptyDescriptionException, MissingArgumentException, InvalidIndexException
* Wrap EchoSession command handling in try/catch; show friendly error messages inside dividers
* Validate mark/unmark: reject non-numeric and out-of-range indices
* Validate deadline: require "/by" with non-empty desc/time
* Validate event: require "/from" and "/to" with non-empty parts
* Validate todo: reject empty/whitespace-only descriptions

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-6: delete tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
* Level-6: delete tasks
* Validate index: missing → MissingArgumentException; non-numeric/out-of-range → InvalidIndexException
* Print removal confirmation with the removed task and updated count
* Preserve double-divider text UI and existing command structure

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-7: implement Level-7 storage; move to com.ip.arshelle
commitResults.messageBody:
* Move entire codebase to com.ip.arshelle
* Add Storage with relative path `./data/duke.txt`; create folder/file if missing
* Load tasks at startup; auto-save after todo/deadline/event/mark/unmark/delete
* Implement `toSaveFormat()` for Todo, Deadline, Event (and Task default if needed)
* Make `Storage.parseTask` tolerant to spacing (`\\s*\\|\\s*`) and skip bad lines
* Wire saving into EchoSession (`save()` helper); optional final save on `bye`

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-7' for Level-7
Level-8: Add support for Dates and Times
commitResults.messageBody:
* Updated Deadline to store due dates as LocalDate instead of raw Strings
* Implemented pretty-printing of dates in format 'MMM dd yyyy' (e.g., Oct 15 2019)
* Modified EchoSession parser to parse yyyy-MM-dd input into LocalDate
* Updated Storage to save deadlines with ISO yyyy-MM-dd format and reload correctly
* Enhanced Event class to pretty-print /from and /to dates in the same format
* Added exception handling for invalid date input with clear error messages

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor: Replace IO/ScannerIO with Ui and integrate TaskList
commitResults.messageBody:
* Removed IO interface and ScannerIO class; all input/output now handled by Ui
* Updated SonOfAnton and Echo to pass a Ui instance instead of IO
* Modified EchoSession to depend on Ui for user interactions (showMessage, showLine, etc.)
* Replaced all direct List<Task> operations with TaskList API (add, markOneBased, unmarkOneBased, removeOneBased, size, get)
* Updated save() to convert TaskList into ArrayList for Storage compatibility

commitResults.messageTitle: Refactor: Introduce Parser and Command pattern, slim down EchoSession
commitResults.messageBody:
* Added Command interface and concrete commands (Bye, List, Mark, Unmark, Delete, AddTodo, AddDeadline, AddEvent)
* Implemented Parser class to convert raw user input into Command objects
* Moved command execution logic out of EchoSession into dedicated Command classes
* Simplified EchoSession to delegate parsing and execution, keeping only task loading/saving
* Preserved existing messages and behaviors while improving OOP structure

commitResults.messageTitle: A-Packages: Organize classes into packages
commitResults.messageBody:
* Moved app runner classes (SonOfAnton, Echo, EchoSession) to com.ip.arshelle.app
* Moved Ui to com.ip.arshelle.ui
* Moved Storage to com.ip.arshelle.storage
* Moved Parser to com.ip.arshelle.parser
* Moved Command interface and command classes (AddTodo, AddDeadline, AddEvent, List, Mark, Unmark, Delete, Bye) to com.ip.arshelle.command
* Moved Task, TaskList, ToDo, Deadline, Event to com.ip.arshelle.task
* Kept all exceptions under com.ip.arshelle.exceptions
* Updated package declarations and imports to match new structure

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'add-gradle-support' Merge branch 'add-gradle-support' into master
A-JUnit: Add JUnit 4 tests for core classes
commitResults.messageBody:
* Added DeadlineTest to verify valid/invalid date parsing and pretty-print formatting
* Added TaskListTest to verify add, mark/unmark (one-based index), and delete operations
* Configured Gradle to run tests and verified they pass with ./gradlew test

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDoc comments to core classes and commands
commitResults.messageBody:
* Added class-level JavaDocs for Echo, EchoSession, SonOfAnton, Command,
  and all major Command classes (AddTodoCommand, AddDeadlineCommand,
  AddEventCommand, DeleteCommand, ListCommand, MarkCommand, UnmarkCommand, ByeCommand).
* Documented public constructors and execute() methods with @param, @return,
  and @throws where relevant.
* This satisfies the A-JavaDoc milestone (at least half of non-private
  classes and methods documented).

commitResults.messageTitle: Coding Standard: Tweak code to comply with coding standard
commitResults.messageBody:
* Expanded one-line constructors/methods into block style.
* Added comments in empty catch blocks to avoid silent exception handling.
* Removed unused constant LINE in SonOfAnton.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-9: Implement find command to search tasks by keyword
commitResults.messageBody:
* Added FindCommand to list tasks containing a given keyword
  (case-insensitive search on task descriptions).
* Updated Parser to recognize the 'find' command and extract keywords.
* Ensured output format matches Duke Level-9 requirements, showing
  matching tasks or a message if none are found.

commitResults.messageTitle: Level-10: add JavaFX-based GUI for SonOfAnton chatbot
commitResults.messageBody:
* Integrated JavaFX Application (Main + Launcher) to replace CLI-only interaction
* Implemented ScrollPane + VBox container for chat display
* Added TextField and Send button for user input
* Connected Ui sink to render bot responses as DialogBox nodes
* Displayed user and bot messages with optional avatar images
* Preserved CLI compatibility (Ui default constructor still prints to console)

commitResults.messageTitle: A-FullCommitMessage : Update build script, data file, and SonOfAnton class
commitResults.messageBody:
* Adjusted build.gradle with JavaFX and Shadow plugin changes
* Updated duke.txt to match new data storage format
* Modified SonOfAnton.java to align with updated logic

commitResults.messageTitle: A-Assetions : Add assertions to command classes
commitResults.messageBody:
* Added asserts in AddDeadlineCommand to check non-empty inputs
* Added asserts in ListCommand to guard against invalid indices
* Added asserts in MarkCommand and UnmarkCommand to validate indices
* Added asserts in DeleteCommand to ensure index validity

commitResults.messageTitle: A-CodeQuality : Refactor for readability and reduce duplication
commitResults.messageBody:
* Extract CommandUtils.saveQuietly to remove repeated try/catch
* Replace magic data path with a named constant in EchoSession
* Split Main.start into small helpers; add layout constants
* Move list formatting to TaskList.toIndexedLines and use in ListCommand
* No behavior changes; improves SLAP and overall readability

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge pull request #2 from Arshelle9912/branch-A-CodeQuality
commitResults.messageBody: A-CodeQuality : Refactor for readability and reduce duplication

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'master' into branch-A-Assertions
Merge pull request #3 from Arshelle9912/branch-A-Assertions
commitResults.messageBody: A-Assetions : Add assertions to command classes

commitResults.messageTitle: BCD-Extensions : add help command and improve unknown command message
commitResults.messageBody:
* Added HelpCommand to show a list of available commands
* Added "help" as command aliases in Parser
* Updated UnknownCommandException to suggest using "help"
* Provides in-app guidance without changing existing features

commitResults.messageTitle: A-AiAssisted: improve docs and add AI.md for AI usage
commitResults.messageBody:
* Added JavaDoc to Main class and helper methods
* Created AI.md to acknowledge AI assistance
* Documented purpose, parameters, and return values
* No behavior changes; improves readability and maintainability

commitResults.messageTitle: A-UserGuide: add GUI screenshot and publish User Guide
commitResults.messageBody:
* Added docs/Ui.png showing full GUI window
* Updated docs/README.md with features, usage, and examples
* Added docs/Published UG.md for extended guide
* Enables GitHub Pages site for SonOfAnton
